name: You Only Live Twice: So Have A Good Time
name_original: You Only Live Twice: So Have A Good Time
description:
STORY

You are a teenage ghost living in a haunted house with your ghost family. You've been invited to an exclusive party but you've been grounded for breaking curfew too many times. There's no way you'll miss out on the hottest party in your afterlife so you'll just have to sneak out!

This game was made in 2 weeks for AdvXJam 2020. Sorry for any bugs that you encounter!

FEATURES

Explore the house to learn more about the cast who live there. If you can find what they're looking for, you might just have an easier time sneaking out without getting caught.  Which of the two endings will you get to experience?

CONTROLS

Move: WASD

Talk/Interact: Space

Navigate Dialogue: Right Mouse Click

INSTRUCTIONS

Download the .zip file and extract to folder. Launch the application to play.

CREDITS

Coding by Taku Mavhunduke

Art by Martyna Pikuła

Written by Yaw Glover
